job_tasks.phrase: fungeren als de verbinder tussen de domeinexperts uit de business lines en afdelingen enerzijds en ons team van AI developers
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates bridging the gap between business domain experts and the AI development team, which is a core aspect of understanding business needs and translating them.

job_tasks.phrase: signaleer je kansen voor het inzetten van AI
job_tasks.justification: Identifying opportunities for AI deployment requires understanding business needs and potential applications.

job_tasks.phrase: breng je vragen en wensen in kaart
job_tasks.justification: Mapping out business questions and desires is a direct function of understanding the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: omzet in passende AI-applicaties met technieken als Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) en Agentic Frameworks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions implementing AI techniques like RAG and Agentic Frameworks, which are core to building and adapting AI models.
The job title itself implies responsibilities across the full stack of software development, including building AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: van zowel front end als back end
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the breadth of software development responsibilities beyond just model building.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaring met Python en/of JavaScript voor web development
job_tasks.justification: Specifying programming languages for web development points to software development tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: fungeren als de verbinder tussen de domeinexperts uit de business lines en afdelingen enerzijds en ons team van AI developers

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes the application of generative AI techniques like RAG and Agentic Frameworks. It also requires full-stack development skills to build user-facing applications around these AI capabilities.
